hero.name: Yoelvys
hero.description: I bridge the gap between design and engineering, building high-performance, scalable web applications with React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Focused on exceptional user experiences and technical excellence.

about.title: Who I am
body: I am a Computer Engineer with over 6 years of experience specializing in the modern web ecosystem. My core strength lies in translating complex business requirements into intuitive, pixel-perfect interfaces.

Beyond coding, I focus on the entire product lifecycle—from architectural decisions and SEO strategy to performance optimization and accessibility. I thrive in agile environments where innovation, code quality, and user satisfaction are paramount.

skills.title: My
skills.description: My tech stack is focused on the JavaScript ecosystem, prioritizing tools that enable speed, scalability, and type safety.

contact.title: Contact Me
body: I'm currently open to new opportunities and collaborations. Whether you have a question regarding a project or want to discuss a potential role, my inbox is open.

items.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
items.answer: I specialize in the modern JavaScript ecosystem, including React, Next.js, TypeScript, and tooling such as Storybook, Cypress, and GSAP.

items.question: What type of projects do you enjoy most?
items.answer: I enjoy bridging design and engineering to build high-performance, scalable web applications with strong user experiences.

items.question: Are you available for freelance or contract work?
items.answer: Yes. I am open to freelance, contract, and long-term collaborations depending on scope, timeline, and team fit.

items.question: Can you join an existing product team and codebase?
items.answer: Absolutely. I am comfortable ramping up quickly in established repositories, following team conventions, and improving code quality incrementally.

items.question: Do you work with design systems and Figma handoff?
items.answer: Yes. I regularly translate Figma designs into reusable components, align with design tokens, and keep implementation consistent across the product.

items.question: Do you optimize for performance and accessibility?
items.answer: Yes. Performance budgets, semantic HTML, keyboard support, and accessibility best practices are core parts of my delivery process.

items.question: Can you help improve technical SEO?
items.answer: Yes. I can support metadata strategy, structured data, Core Web Vitals improvements, and indexability best practices for content and apps.

items.question: What does your collaboration process look like?
items.answer: I usually start with a quick discovery call, define priorities with clear milestones, and maintain transparent communication through regular progress updates.

items.question: Do you offer code reviews or mentoring sessions?
items.answer: Yes. I provide focused code reviews, architecture feedback, and mentoring on frontend patterns, testing, and scalable project structure.
